title: Alpine Retreat in Banff National Park with Five Restaurants & Bars & Shuttle Service
description:
Tucked in Banffâ€™s peaceful wilderness, experience the grandeur of the Canadian Rockies with a luxury stay at The Rimrock Resort Hotel Banff. Perched on the side of Sulphur Mountain, this stunning property offers unparalleled views of the snow-capped peaks and verdant valleys. The resort's elegant rooms and suites are tastefully furnished, providing a cosy retreat after a day of mountain adventures.

Venture beyond the resort to explore the world-renowned Banff National Park, or take a short drive to the charming town of Banff, brimming with boutique shops, art galleries and quaint cafes. At the resort, savour award-winning fine dining at Eden Restaurant, renowned for international cuisine influenced by local ingredients.
